channel.title: How to get this in a line

item.title: How to get this in a line
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

I got my commands in the music panel but they’re all over the place like a mad grannies shit.

How do I get them in just one long row going down.

[code]//Narbmark: LIST
/START OF MUSIC LIST/
sendQuest("@red@C@whi@o@red@m@whi@m@red@a@whi@n@red@d@whi@s", 3206);
